price: 1. Alif Lām Rā. (Ini adalah) Kitab yang Kami turunkan kepadamu (Muhammad) agar engkau mengeluarkan manusia dari kegelapan kepada cahaya terang-benderang dengan izin Tuhan, (yaitu) menuju jalan Tuhan Yang Mahaperkasa, Maha Terpuji.
arabic: الٓرۚ كِتَٰبٌ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ إِلَيۡكَ لِتُخۡرِجَ ٱلنَّاسَ مِنَ ٱلظُّلُمَٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِ بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِمۡ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alif-lam-ra kitābun anzalnāhu ilayka litukh'rija al-nāsa mina al-ẓulumāti ilā al-nūri bi-idh'ni rabbihim ilā ṣirāṭi al-ʿazīzi al-ḥamīdi
translations: so that you may bring out
